tool_description: Scans and logs returned items upon arrival at the return processing center, creating digital inventory records.

return_authorization_number.description: Return authorization number for the incoming package

scanned_items.description: Array of product SKUs or barcodes scanned from returned items

processor_id.description: ID of the employee or station processing the return

error_messages: Invalid return authorization: Authorization number not found or already processed.
Unrecognized item codes: One or more scanned items do not match catalog SKUs.
Item mismatch: Scanned items do not match items listed in original return authorization.
Invalid timestamp: Scan timestamp must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Invalid processor ID: Processor ID not found in employee database.
Duplicate scan: These items have already been scanned for this return authorization.
usage: Scan returned items and input return_authorization_number, scanned_items array, scan_timestamp, and processor_id. Tool validates and logs receipt of returned merchandise.

scan_confirmation_id.description: Unique identifier for this scanning session

items_confirmed.description: List of successfully scanned and confirmed items

discrepancies.description: List of items that don't match return authorization

next_step.description: Recommended next action: inspection, immediate_restock, escalation
